segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on the stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom hasn't noticed them yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing precariously; it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar looks full; it must be tempting for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the cookies just by looking at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they should wait until their mom can help them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a mess with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
